channel.title: Random rants about map making
channel.description:
So, I've been experimenting a bit with monster_generics, to make scientists that use melee weapons.
It worked perfectly fine until somehow they all became non-solid. After testing removing a lot of stuff I find out that the only reason they're not solid, is because they become non-solid if you place them onto the floor instead of a few inches up in the air.
GG, Hammer you so silly.

item.title: Random rants about map making
item.dc:creator: AsinoEsel
item.description:
Ouch. But at least you can blame it on Hammer.
I recently added two func_tracktrains to my map only to find out the second one was glitchy as fuck. Tried absolutely everything… Then found out I parented the second tracktrain’s model to the first tracktrain, not the second.
I’ve never felt this much like an idiot in my entire life, believe me.

Read full topic
